visit-casedashboard-scheduled.ppFootQ1: What findings will you be looking for when you examine my foot? What do each of these findings mean?
visit-casedashboard-scheduled.ppFootQ3: Are there any lifestyle changes I should make? Should I be wearing or avoiding certain footwear?
visit-casedashboard-scheduled.ppFootQ4: What are the different treatment options, and which is best for me? Why?
visit-casedashboard-scheduled.ppFootQ5: Do you think I need a foot x-ray or any imaging?
visit-casedashboard-scheduled.ppFootQ6: Are there certain symptoms for which I should seek immediate medical attention?
visit-casedashboard-scheduled.ppOrthQ1: What are my treatment options for improving my symptoms? Are there non-surgical techniques that could be as effective as surgery?
visit-casedashboard-scheduled.ppOrthQ2: If you are recommending a surgery or procedure, how strong is the evidence that this surgery will improve my symptoms? Does it work better than a conservative treatment?
visit-casedashboard-scheduled.ppOrthQ3: What are the risks of the surgery?
